items.raw_string: Name of donor: Rolls-Royce PlcAddress of donor: 62 Buckingham Gate, London SW1E 6ATEstimate of the probable value (or amount of any donation): Accommodation and food for my husband and myself, plus flights for my husband, with a total value of £661Destination of visit: BerlinDates of visit: 17-20 September 2016Purpose of visit: As a member of the British-German APPG, to visit the German Parliament and Rolls-Royce Aero Engines, and discussions of implications of Brexit with British Embassy and British-German Group in the Bundestag.(Registered 19 December 2016)
